item.title: project III: Financial Advisor
item.description: Financial Advisor is an innovative AI-powered application designed to provide personalized investment and savings advice tailored to individual user needs. Leveraging advanced machine learning algorithms, the app analyzes user inputs such as financial goals, risk tolerance, and current investment portfolios to deliver customized recommendations. With a user-friendly interface built on Flask and powered by Python and LLM’s, the app simplifies the complexities of personal finance. Users can easily input their financial data, explore various investment strategies, and receive actionable insights to optimize their savings and investment plans.
